src:
Santiago Bernabeu, Panggung Pertunjukan Karim Benzema
01 Nov 2019, 09:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Karim Benzema memimpin torehan gol dan assists Real Madrid musim ini. Dia kembali membuktikan diri sebagai salah satu pemain terbaik dalam skuad. Benzema bukan striker biasa.
Pemain nomor 9 ini mencetak dua assist kala El Real mengalahkan Leganes 5-0 tengah pekan ini, dengan tambahan itu, Benzema berarti sudah menyumbangkan empat assists sejauh ini. Dia pun mencetak satu gol pada laga itu, yang menambah koleksinya jadi tujuh gol.
Tak hanya itu, Benzema pun menjadi poros serangan Madrid. Formasi tiga penyerang Madrid dengan Eden Hazard dan Rodrygo bisa berjalan baik hanya karena adanya Benzema di tengah keduanya.
Benzema pun ternyata punya catatan impresif selama bermain di Santiago Bernabeu. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Santiago Bernabeu, Karim Benzema Stage Performance
Nov 01 2019, 09:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Karim Benzema leads Real Madrid to score goals and assists this season. He again proved himself as one of the best players in the squad. Benzema is no ordinary striker.
Player number 9 scored two assists when El Real defeated Leganes 5-0 this week, with the addition, Benzema means to have contributed four assists so far. He also scored one goal in that match, which added to his collection seven goals.
Not only that, Benzema also became the axis of Madrid's attack. Formation of three Madrid striker with Eden Hazard and Rodrygo can work well only because of Benzema in the middle of both.
Benzema also turned out to have an impressive record while playing at the Santiago Bernabeu. Read below, Bolaneters!
